executive_summary.key_strength: High-income, educated, diverse population in strategic location
executive_summary.primary_challenge: Coordination between two counties and transportation access
executive_summary.top_opportunity: Technology sector development leveraging proximity to BWI/DC corridor

strengths: High-income community ($143,409 median) - strong economic base
Strong real estate market ($492,100 median home value)
challenges: Housing affordability concerns for new residents

high_priority.description: Improve shuttle service to Savage MARC station and advocate for increased Camden Line service
high_priority.rationale: High-income residents likely commute to DC/Baltimore

high_priority.description: Develop tech business park leveraging proximity to BWI and educated workforce
high_priority.rationale: High-income, diverse population ideal for tech talent

high_priority.description: Implement intelligent traffic systems on Route 32 and major corridors
high_priority.rationale: Manage growth and improve commuter experience

medium_priority.description: Create walkable commercial districts with retail, dining, and services
medium_priority.rationale: High-income residents support premium local businesses

medium_priority.description: Establish community college satellite and workforce development center
medium_priority.rationale: Support growing population and economic diversification

medium_priority.description: Develop high-quality sports complexes and community centers
medium_priority.rationale: Match amenities to affluent community expectations

long_term.description: Establish formal coordination between Howard and Anne Arundel Counties
Develop cultural amenities leveraging diversity and affluence
long_term.rationale: Enhance quality of life and attract residents/businesses

quarter_2: Initiate zoning review for mixed-use development
quarter_3: Identify sites for technology business development
quarter_4: Launch pilot shuttle service to MARC

year_2_3: Begin construction of priority development projects
year_4_5: Establish Hanover as regional tech hub
Achieve target metrics for community improvements

economic: Increase in local business registrations by 25%
Increase in commercial tax base by 30%
transportation: Double MARC ridership from Hanover area
Complete 10 miles of new pedestrian/cycling infrastructure
education: Achieve top 10% ranking in state education metrics

next_steps: Present findings to Howard County and Anne Arundel County leadership
Engage community stakeholders for input and buy-in
Secure funding for priority transportation improvements
Establish public-private partnerships for development projects
